titleNullable: CoQA QndA Dataset with ground truth
descriptionNullable: ## **Source Dataset:** This data is a processed version of [https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/jeromeblanchet/conversational-question-answering-dataset-coqa](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/jeromeblanchet/conversational-question-answering-dataset-coqa) dataset. ## **Fields are mapped as below:** 1. data -> questions -> input_text to **question** 2. data -> answers -> input_text to **answer** 3. data -> answers -> span_text to **ground_truth** 4. data -> story to **context** 5. data -> id to **data_id** 6. **question_id** is generated sequentially. ## **Processed using the notebook:** [https://www.kaggle.com/code/vigneshboss/coqa-dataset-to-qnda-dataset-with-ground-truth](https://www.kaggle.com/code/vigneshboss/coqa-dataset-to-qnda-dataset-with-ground-truth) ## **Dataset Logo Credit:** Photo by Wesley Tingey on Unsplash
title: CoQA QndA Dataset with ground truth
subtitle: Processed version of https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/jeromeblanchet/conversation
description: ## **Source Dataset:** This data is a processed version of [https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/jeromeblanchet/conversational-question-answering-dataset-coqa](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/jeromeblanchet/conversational-question-answering-dataset-coqa) dataset. ## **Fields are mapped as below:** 1. data -> questions -> input_text to **question** 2. data -> answers -> input_text to **answer** 3. data -> answers -> span_text to **ground_truth** 4. data -> story to **context** 5. data -> id to **data_id** 6. **question_id** is generated sequentially. ## **Processed using the notebook:** [https://www.kaggle.com/code/vigneshboss/coqa-dataset-to-qnda-dataset-with-ground-truth](https://www.kaggle.com/code/vigneshboss/coqa-dataset-to-qnda-dataset-with-ground-truth) ## **Dataset Logo Credit:** Photo by Wesley Tingey on Unsplash
